Common.description: TangleChains is the ultimate directory for EVM and smart contract chains on Shimmer and IOTA. It serves as a hub for information on smart contract chains, offering details on their RPC endpoints, one-click wallet connect and other key information.
Common.help-info: List and discover smart contract chains on Shimmer.
Common.how-to-add-network: How to add your smart contract chain
Common.how-to-add-rpc: How to add your RPC endpoint
